steps: Establish a legitimate-sounding import/export company in Singapore to serve as the front
Create a shell company in the British Virgin Islands with complex ownership structure
Set up a fake supplier company in China using altered shipping documentation
Generate false purchase orders for machinery between Singapore and China entities
Open trade credit facility through Dubai-based intermediary bank
Process over-invoiced shipments through Hong Kong logistics hub
Transfer funds from Dubai to BVI shell company using trade finance transactions
Disburse cash from shell company to real estate investment firm in Switzerland
Final integration via purchase of luxury goods from Miami-based seller
Create paper trail showing cross-border trade that matches financial flows
evasion_techniques: Use of multiple jurisdictions (Singapore, BVI, Dubai)
Falsified shipping manifests and insurance documentation
Over-invoicing by 35% of actual shipment values
Timing discrepancies between trade documentation and fund transfers
